name: Premiere
description:
Six film reels have been stolen from your film studios by a rival company. In this platform game, your mission is to rescue from within the sets and backstage rooms they have been hidden in. Backstage sections are entered through doors, and weapons can often be collected in these.

The sets are themed around six different genres of film, and the backdrops, weapons and enemies fit these sections. There is a slapstick comedy played out in black and white (complete with greyscale background) a cartoon with lots of Road Runnering and goofy facial expressions, a Wild West romp, Sci-Fi complete with aliens, and so on. After each platform level you will have to pass through a film scene - piloting a runaway mine-cart, navigating a scrolling shoot 'em up level, or similar.

shot.caption: This is from the intro. Someone has stolen some film reels, and your mission is to find them.
The first level takes place in a wild west movie-studio.
A gunman hiding in a barrel.
This is a strange and dangerous movie-studio. A living cactus, and a funny-looking sheriff are among your enemies.
The indians are trying to kill you as well.
Of course, it wouldn't be the wild west without a duel.
This is an old black and white movie, with an Egyptian theme.
And now I'm suddenly in some kind of gangster-movie.
Chased by a train. I'm throwing dynamite at it, to keep it away from me.
The third level is a horror-movie. Very spooky indeed.
Inside a haunted mansion. This is a scary place...
This game was designed with a lot of humor.
I don't know what kind of movie this level is supposed to represent, but perhaps a cartoon?
That fly is trying to drop a weight on me.
Eat popcorn to restore your health.
